whitecat.core.role
Class RoleRepository

java.lang.Object
  whitecat.core.role.RoleRepository
Direct Known Subclasses:
RoleRepositoryImpl
public abstract class RoleRepository
extends java.lang.Object

The interface for a generic role repository. A repository stores available roles in the platform by means of their role descriptors (and event & action descriptors) and provides them on demand.

Author:
Luca Ferrari - cat4hire (at) sourceforge.net

Method Detail

installRole

public abstract boolean installRole(RoleDescriptor descriptor,
                                    IRole role,
                                    boolean overrideIfExists)
                             throws WCRoleRepositoryException
Installs a new role descriptor in the system. The descriptor must be providen as well as the role implementation itself.

Parameters:
descriptor - the role descriptor to bind the role implementatio to
role - the role implementation
overrideIfExists - if true, the role will be associated with the specified role descriptor even if the same role/role descriptor has been used before, if false, in the case the same role has been associated with a different role descriptor, the installation will not succeed
Returns:
true if the role has been installed, false otherwise
Throws:
WCRoleRepositoryException - if something goes wrong with the role installation

removeRole

public abstract boolean removeRole(IRole role)
                            throws WCRoleRepositoryException
Removes a role from the repository.

Parameters:
role - the role to remove
Returns:
true if the role has been removed, false if not
Throws:
WCRoleRepositoryException - if something goes wrong

removeRole

public abstract boolean removeRole(RoleDescriptor descriptor)
                            throws WCRoleRepositoryException
Deletes all the roles associated with this descriptor.

Parameters:
descriptor - the role descriptor to delete
Returns:
true if the role has been deleted, false otherwise
Throws:
WCRoleRepositoryException - if something goes wrong

findRole

public abstract IRole findRole(RoleDescriptor descriptor)
                        throws WCRoleRepositoryException
Searches for a role implementation starting from a role descriptor.

Parameters:
descriptor - the descriptor to search for the role
Returns:
the role if present in the repository
Throws:
WCRoleRepositoryException - if something goes wrong

getAvailableRoleDescriptors

public abstract java.util.List<RoleDescriptor> getAvailableRoleDescriptors()
                                                                    throws WCRoleRepositoryException
Provides the list of the role descriptors available in the repository. This list should not be modified directly to change the content of the role descriptor.

Returns:
the list of available role descriptors
Throws:
WCRoleRepositoryException - if something goes wrong

getInstance

public static RoleRepository getInstance()
Creates and returns the correct instance of the role repository to adopt depending on the configuration of the system.

Returns:
the role repository to use.
